#summary List of projects using Robbus protocol

= Reference projects =

Besides the test code in project repository you can find Robbus protocol in following devices and projects:

 * *[http://wiki.robotika.cz/RobotIrena Robot Irena]:* robotic car for contests: [http://www.vosrk.cz/roboorienteering/ RoboOrienteering] (1st place in 2010), [http://www.kufr.cz/view.php?cisloclanku=2010020002 Robotem Rovne], [http://robotika.cz/competitions/robotour/en Robotour], [http://www.sick.com/group/EN/home/pr/events/robot_day/Pages/Robot_day_2010.aspx SICK Robot Day]
 * *[http://code.google.com/p/avrbikelight/ AVR Bike Light]:* complete bycicle light system
 * *!HiBeMaTo:* robot for [http://www.eurobot.cz/eurobot2010.php Eurobot Starter] Contest
